Content.Text:
<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, Soseki.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hi Klaus. I'm surprised to see you here.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm here to get back the book I lent you
the other day.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Ah, hold on a moment. I'm just looking
for it now. Oh, where did I put it?

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see you still haven't tidied this
place up. It's so horribly dusty!
You've got the time, so tidy up!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sorry, sorry. You know me, I'll always
slack off if given the chance.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You need to rethink your entire
lifestyle, honestly. You always sleep
in, stay up late...
<PAGE>
And drink too much, too! You won't last
into old age, I'm telling you!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ah hah hah, you might be right. I'll be
more careful, I promise.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
This is no laughing matter, honestly!
I'm warning you as your doctor. You 
need to pay attention!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, found it! Here you go.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, Klaus.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You're not paying any attention, are
you?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yes, I am! I only seemed cheerful to you
because what you said made me happy.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Happy?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
At my age, it's good to have someone who
who will worry about you, and get angry
if you don't take care of yourself.
<PAGE>
Getting angry with an adult isn't an
easy undertaking. I know I wouldn't do
it.
<PAGE>
So it made me happy. I'm grateful!

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I can't help but feel you don't know
the folks in town that well. They all
get angry when its called for!

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's why I love living here. There's
a warmth here that you can't find in the
city.
<PAGE>
Things are so peaceful here. I'm happy
every day that I moved here.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Then you should thank <MYNAME>.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hah hah. You're right. I will. I owe
this house to <MYNAME>, after all.
<PAGE>
Maybe we should even break bread
together.

<FACE_KUROZE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
If you're that grateful, maybe you
should tidy up your room a little?
<MYNAME> wouldn't like to see this mess.

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Y-Yes, you're right.
<PAGE>
Okay, point taken. I'll tidy up a little
now.
